member.name: F:COMMAND_OPTION.mDescription
member.example: You can specify, that your option --help means "Print this help screen and exit".

member.name: F:COMMAND_OPTION.mNeedValue
member.summary:
Flag denotes, if this option needs a value.
Default value is false.
member.example: You can specify, that your option --length need a value, i.e. --length NUMBER must be used.

member.name: F:COMMAND_OPTION.mLongName
member.summary:
Option long description.
Just write in " " all the symbols, you want to describe your option.

member.name: F:COMMAND_OPTION.mShortNames
member.summary:
Option short descriptions.
Just write in " " all the symbols, you want to describe your option.
member.example: You can use "hH" for -h -H --help, for example.

members.member: Class COMMAND_OPTION presents a description for a single command line parameter, i.e. -h or --help or -v or --version
